name: business_photos
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool local_business_data.
Tool description: Extremely comprehensive and up-to-date local business search - get business reviews and rating, photos, phone, address / location, website, opening hours, emails / social profiles and 30+ additional fields.
API description: Fetches photos of a business using its unique Business Id through the RapidAPI service.

business_id.description: The unique identifier of the business. This can be a google_id, business_id, or google_place_id. Examples of valid IDs include `0x880fd393d427a591:0x8cba02d713a995ed` and `ChIJkaUn1JPTD4gR7ZWpE9cCuow`.

limit.description: The maximum number of business photos to return. Acceptable values range from 1 to 10000. Defaults to 5.

fields.description:
A comma separated list of review fields to include in the response (field projection). By default all fields are returned.

**e.g.** `type,photo_url`

region.description:
Query Google Maps from a particular region or country. For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code).

**Default:** *`us`*
